title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On the Project Properties Info page, the fields for Path, Type, and other properties are displayed as readonly text fields.
EB: The fields for Path, Type, and other properties should be displayed as labels instead of readonly text fields.
SR: To reproduce the issue, select a Project, right-click and go to Properties. On the subsequent Info page, observe the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type, etc.).
